Title: Article Two
Plot: Leslie works to get rid of outdated laws from the original town charter. April and Ron receive management training from Chris. Ben finds himself in a bidding war against Ann to win a present for Leslie.
GuestStars: Patton Oswalt, Jon Glaser, James Greene, Kevin Symons, Brian Stack, Yvans Jourdain, Burr Middleton, Jaime Moyer
